dct_description_sm: California shown as an unlabeled island with an indented northern coast.
Map does not include any place names.
"3" at top right corner, inside border.

"One of the earliest school atlases to use a system of letters on blank maps that are coded to a separate key list. This method was based on a teaching system formulated by Johann HÃ¼bner (1668-1731) and adapted by Homann"--David Rumsey Collection catalog.
